items.label: hasHeader(string headerName)(boolean)
items.documentation: Checks whether the requested header key exists in the header map.

items.label: getHeader(string headerName)(string)
items.documentation:
Returns the value of the specified header. If the specified header key maps to multiple values, the first of
these values is returned.

items.label: getHeaders(string headerName)(string[])
items.documentation: Gets all the header values to which the specified header key maps to.

items.label: setHeader(string headerName, string headerValue)
items.documentation:
Sets the specified header to the request. If a mapping already exists for the specified header key, the existing
header value is replaced with the specfied header value.

items.label: addHeader(string headerName, string headerValue)
items.documentation: Adds the specified header to the request. Existing header values are not replaced.

items.label: removeHeader(string key)
items.documentation: Removes the specified header from the request.

items.label: removeAllHeaders()
items.documentation: Removes all the headers from the request.

items.label: getHeaderNames()(string[])
items.documentation: Gets all the names of the headers of the request.

items.label: expects100Continue()(boolean)
items.documentation: Checks whether the client expects a `100-continue` response.

items.label: setContentType(string contentType)(error?)
items.documentation: Sets the `content-type` header to the request.

items.label: getContentType()(string)
items.documentation: Gets the type of the payload of the request (i.e: the `content-type` header value).

items.label: getJsonPayload()(json|error)
items.documentation: Extracts `json` payload from the request. If the content type is not JSON, an `error` is returned.

items.label: getXmlPayload()(xml|error)
items.documentation: Extracts `xml` payload from the request. If the content type is not XML, an `error` is returned.

items.label: getTextPayload()(string|error)
items.documentation: Extracts `text` payload from the request. If the content type is not of type text, an `error` is returned.

items.label: getPayloadAsString()(string|error)
items.documentation:
Gets the request payload as a `string`. Content type is not checked during payload construction which
makes this different from `getTextPayload()` function.

items.label: getBinaryPayload()(byte[]|error)
items.documentation: Gets the request payload as a `byte[]`.

items.label: getByteChannel()(ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|error)
items.documentation:
Gets the request payload as a `ByteChannel` except in the case of multiparts. To retrieve multiparts, use
`getBodyParts()`.

items.label: getBodyParts()(ballerina/mime:Entity[]|error)
items.documentation:
Extracts body parts from the request. If the content type is not a composite media type, an error
is returned.

items.label: getFormParams()(map<string>|error)
items.documentation: Gets the form parameters from the HTTP request as a `map`.

items.label: setJsonPayload(json payload, string contentType = application/json)
items.documentation: Sets a `json` as the payload.

items.label: setXmlPayload(xml payload, string contentType = application/xml)
items.documentation: Sets an `xml` as the payload.

items.label: setTextPayload(string payload, string contentType = text/plain)
items.documentation: Sets a `string` as the payload.

items.label: setBinaryPayload(byte[] payload, string contentType = application/octet-stream)
items.documentation: Sets a `byte[]` as the payload.

items.label: setBodyParts(mime:Entity[] bodyParts, string contentType = multipart/form-data)
items.documentation: Set multiparts as the payload.

items.label: setFileAsPayload(string filePath, string contentType = application/octet-stream)
items.documentation: Sets the content of the specified file as the entity body of the request.

items.label: setByteChannel(io:ReadableByteChannel payload, string contentType = application/octet-stream)
items.documentation: Sets a `ByteChannel` as the payload.

items.label: setPayload(string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[] payload)
items.documentation: Sets the request payload.

items.label: createNewEntity()(ballerina/mime:Entity)
items.documentation: Create a new `Entity` and link it with the request.

items.label: setEntity(mime:Entity e)
items.documentation: Sets the provided `Entity` to the request.

items.label: getQueryParams()(map<string>)
items.documentation: Gets the query parameters of the request, as a map.

items.label: getMatrixParams(string path)(map)
items.documentation: Gets the matrix parameters of the request.

items.label: getEntity()(ballerina/mime:Entity|error)
items.documentation: Gets the `Entity` associated with the request.
